name: neemee-mcp
description: MCP client library and bridge for Neemee personal knowledge management system

scripts.test: npm run test:client && npm run test:legacy
scripts.test:server: npm run build && NODE_ENV=development NEEMEE_API_KEY=test-key node dist/server.js
scripts.release:patch: npm version patch && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:major: npm version major && git push && git push --tags

author: Paul Bonneville <paul@paulbonneville.com>
